downloadTitle: Kinect for Windows Developer Toolkit v1.8
downloadDescription: The Kinect for Windows Developer Toolkit contains updated and new source code samples, Kinect Fusion, Kinect Interactions, Kinect Studio, and other resources to simplify developing Kinect for Windows applications.
detailsSection:
The Kinect for Windows Developer Toolkit includes the following:
  • Updated and new source code samples
  • Kinect Fusion
  • Kinect controls for adding gesture capabilities to your application
  • Kinect Studio
  • The Face Tracking SDK
  • Other valuable development resources
  • Note: The Kinect for Windows Developer Toolkit requires that the Kinect for Windows SDK v1.8 be installed
systemRequirementsSection:
• Hardware Requirements


    • Your computer must have the following minimum capabilities:
    • 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor
    • Dual-core 2.66-GHz or faster processor
    • Dedicated USB 2.0 bus
    • 2 GB RAM
    • A Microsoft Kinect for Windows sensor


  • Software Requirements
    • Kinect for Windows SDK v1.8
installInstructionSection:
To install the Kinect for Windows Developer Toolkit:
  1. Make sure you have the Kinect for Windows SDK v1.8 installed
  2. From the download location, double-click on KinectDeveloperToolkit-v1.8-Setup.exe. This single installer works for both 32-bit and 64-bit Windows.
  3. To view the tools or samples, install stamples, or explore other resources, start the Developer Toolkit Browser via the start menu: Kinect for Windows SDK 1.8 -> Developer Toolkit Browser v1.8 (Kinect for Windows)
